idea-plugin.name: CodeStyle Sync
idea-plugin.description:
Plugin generating the .codeStyles folder in the top level of your project
Add any codestyle file to this folder to sync it automatically with your IntelliJ based IDE Share the CodeStyle through git among your team and when updated in the repository your team automatically will sync with the new code style.

The plugin doesn't take care of automatically formatting your project's files after replacing the new codestyle
idea-plugin.change-notes:
Version: 1.0
Release of the initial version of the CodeStyle plugin

action.description: Find codestyle folder within project top level folder and sync codestyle files with Android Studio
